translations.Speech-To-Text provider running OpenAI W: Speech-To-Text provider running OpenAI Whisper locally

Speech-To-Text provider running OpenAI Whisper locally

The models run completely on your machine. No private data leaves your servers.

Requires:

 * Architecture: x86_64
 * OS: Linux

After installing this app you will need to run

    occ stt_whisper:download-models [model-name]

where [model-name] is one of

 * small
 * medium (default)
 * large

translations.Machine learning models have been downlo: Machine learning models have been downloaded successfully.
translations.The machine learning models still need t: The machine learning models still need to be downloaded (see below).
translations.It seems that your server processor does: It seems that your server processor does not support AVX instructions. Without AVX instructions this app currently does not work.
translations.Background Jobs are not executed via cro: Background Jobs are not executed via cron. This app requires background jobs to be executed via cron.
translations.The app was installed successfully and w: The app was installed successfully and will transcribe files in background processes on request.
translations.Select the machine learning model to be: Select the machine learning model to be used for Speech-To-Text transcription. The larger the model the more resources like RAM, CPU and time are needed. However, the smaller the model, the less accurate the results will be. To use a model you need to download it using the following command:
translations.Small model (~1GB RAM, ~1x recording tim: Small model (~1GB RAM, ~1x recording time, ~10-20% word error rate)
translations.Medium model (~2GB RAM, ~3x recording ti: Medium model (~2GB RAM, ~3x recording time, ~7-15% word error rate)
translations.Large model (~3.5GB RAM, ~5x recording t: Large model (~3.5GB RAM, ~5x recording time, ~4-12% word error rate)
translations.The number of threads to use (for both t: The number of threads to use (for both transcoding media files to audio as well as the transcription process)
translations.FFmpeg executable was installed successf: FFmpeg executable was installed successfully and works.
